short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select a text, right click and translate it on Google Translate or DeepL. Directly translate text found on a website with 2 clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will add a button when you select and right click on a text. This button will ask if you want to translate on Google Translate or DeepL the text you selected.
No need to copy/paste and waste time.
